name: The New Way (IAPSOP)
content:
The New Way (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: The New Way Summary:   From Pat Deveney's database: New Way, The. Illustrated Monthly. The Best Is Yet to Come 1911--1929 Monthly Point Loma, CA. Editor: Katherine Tingley. Succeeded by: Theosophical Path (incorporated into, 1929) Corporate author: International Theosophical League of Humanity 1/1, 1911-1929. 8 pp. Free "for prisoners and others whether behind the bars or not." Part of Tingley's Theosophical work for prisoners, although the journal appears rather highbrow for the expected audience. University of California. Issues:New Way 1911 New Way 1912 New Way 1913 New Way 1914 New Way 1915 New Way 1916 New Way 1917 New Way 1918 New Way 1919 New Way 1920 New Way 1921 New Way 1922 New Way 1923 New Way 1924 New Way 1925 New Way 1926 New Way 1927 New Way 1928 New Way 1929
